user_question: What are the most unusual themed hotels in the world, and can you generate an image of one?
final_answer: Some of the most unusual themed hotels in the world include the Icehotel in Sweden, the Treehotel also in Sweden, and the Dog Bark Park Inn in Idaho, USA. Image of the Icehotel generated.
